attributes.action: reissue National Insurance numbers in light of the HM Revenue and Customs database loss
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the loss of bank details, National Insurance numbers and other personal information, 7.25 million families in the UK are substantially more at risk of identity theft.  While we the people can change our bank accounts, we believe that confidence in the government's handling of this crisis would be significantly improved if they were to offer new N.I numbers to all concerned.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
